content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The apartment is, after all, in the city center. How does 1200 euros per month sound to you? Remember, I'm not here to make friends, just to get the best deal for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1200 euros seems a bit high for the area, considering the size and the fact that it's unfurnished. Would you be willing to negotiate lower?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, I'm always open to negotiation. But remember, the apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. How about 1100 euros per month? I'm being quite lenient here, I must say.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1100 euros is still quite steep for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I'm a student, so I'm looking for a more reasonable price. Would you consider 900 euros? It's a fair offer considering the size and the fact that I'll be providing all the furniture.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm afraid 900 euros is too low for me. Considering the prime location of the apartment, I can't go below 1050 euros. I'm trying to be reasonable here, but I can't let the apartment go for too cheap.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1050 euros is more like it. It's a fair price for the location and the amenities. I'm willing to agree to that.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1050] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! We have a deal at 1050 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
